title: Ajith Kumar’s racing team emerges 3rd in Dubai 24H 2025; R Madhavan, Sivakarthikeyan, Udhay Stalin, others congratulate - Mint
summary:
Ajith Kumar’s Racing Team Secures Third Place in Dubai 24H 2025

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: Live Mint

Tamil superstar Ajith Kumar made a remarkable return to racing, leading his team to a third-place finish in the 24H Dubai 2025 endurance race.

  • Ajith Kumar Racing secured victory in the 991 category and was recognized for the Spirit of the Race in the GT4 category.
  • The team celebrated their wins with the Indian flag as fans cheered on.
  • R Madhavan, Udhay Stalin, and others publicly congratulated Ajith Kumar on social media.
  • Ajith Kumar shared a heartfelt moment with his wife after his victory.
“So so proud.. what a man. The one and only. Ajith Kumar,” - R Madhavan

Ajith Kumar's achievements in the race serve as an inspiration, showcasing his dedication and passion for the sport.
newTitle: Ajith Kumar’s Racing Team Secures Third Place in Dubai 24H 2025

title: Telugu actor Rana Daggubati, family members booked over Deccan Kitchen Hotel demolition: Report - Deccan Herald
summary:
Rana Daggubati and Family Face Legal Action Over Hotel Demolition

Published: 12 January 2025 | Source: Hyderabad News

A case has been filed against Telugu actor Rana Daggubati and several family members, including actor Venkatesh Daggubati, over the demolition of a hotel in Hyderabad that was run by a businessman on land leased from the Daggubati family.

  • The FIR was registered under IPC sections like criminal conspiracy and house trespass.
  • The complainant, who has a pending lawsuit regarding the lease, claims the family unlawfully demolished the hotel structure.
  • The incident prompted a court directive for police investigation.
"The Daggubati family had leased the premises in 2014, and the complainant alleges that they tried to unlawfully remove him from the property."

The case is ongoing, with police investigations being conducted following the court's instructions.
newTitle: Rana Daggubati and Family Face Legal Action Over Hotel Demolition

title: Kangana Ranaut reveals why she never worked with ‘good friend’ Salman Khan: ‘We had many opportunities but…’ - Hindustan Times
Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collection Day 1 - Sacnilk
Rana Daggubati, Venkatesh and family members booked over Hyderabad hotel demolition - The News Minute
summary:
Family of Actors Venkatesh and Rana Daggubati Face Legal Action Over Hotel Demolition in Hyderabad

Published on: 12 Jan 2025, 12:19 pm

Hyderabad police have registered a case against actors Venkatesh and Rana Daggubati along with their family members regarding the demolition of the Deccan Kitchen Hotel.

  • The Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation had partially demolished the hotel in November 2022.
  • The complete demolition of the structure was executed by the Daggubati family in January 2024.
  • A First Information Report (FIR) lists multiple Daggubati family members as accused, including Daggubati Suresh, Daggubati Venkatesh, Daggubati Rana, and Daggubati Abhiram.
  • The case is under various sections of the Indian Penal Code for house-trespass and criminal conspiracy.
  • A court directed the police to take action based on a complaint by Nanda Kumar, who alleges illegal demolition despite a court injunction.
  • Kumar claims to have suffered a loss of Rs 20 crore due to the actions of the Daggubati family.
Nanda Kumar claims to have suffered a loss of Rs 20 crore due to the demolition and vandalism.

This legal action highlights the ongoing disputes over property and legal compliance in urban development scenarios in Hyderabad.
newTitle: Family of Actors Venkatesh and Rana Daggubati Face Legal Action Over Hotel Demolition in Hyderabad

title: Game Changer box office collection day 3: Ram Charan-Shankar film crosses Indian 2 lifetime, mints over ₹88 crore - Hindustan Times
summary:
Game Changer box office collection day 3: Shankar's Telugu debut film is not performing as expected, given that this is just its first week.

Jan 12, 2025 - Hindustan Times

The film Game Changer, directed by Shankar and starring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, has crossed the lifetime collection of Indian 2, grossing ₹88.93 crore in its opening weekend, although it is not performing as strongly as expected.

  • The film collected ₹16.33 crore on its third day.
  • On opening day, it earned ₹51 crore but saw a significant drop of 57.65% on day two, earning ₹21.6 crore.
  • Occupancy rates have also seen declines, particularly for the Telugu version.
  • The overall performance is being closely observed with competition from other new releases.
“Game Changer tells the story of an IAS officer called Ram Nandan, linking his story to an activist called Appanna.”

Despite its impressive opening, the film's future box office performance remains uncertain as competition heats up in its subsequent weeks.
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Collection: Over ₹88 Crore in Just Three Days

title: Game Changer box office collection day 3 (updated live): Ram Charan-Shankar film crosses Indian 2 lifetime - Hindustan Times
summary:
Game Changer box office collection day 3 (updated live): Shankar's Telugu debut crossed lifetime collections of his much-hyped Kamal Haasan-starrer.

Date: Jan 12, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Shankar’s maiden Telugu film Game Changer has crossed the lifetime collection of his previous film, Indian 2. As of 7 PM, the film has grossed ₹85.09 crore net in India.

  • On its opening day, Game Changer collected ₹51 crore net in India.
  • Day 2 showed a significant drop with a 57.65% decrease, earning only ₹21.6 crore net.
  • The film registered an 18.01% occupancy for its morning shows.
  • The competition includes Balakrishna’s Daaku Maharaaj and Venkatesh-starrer Sankranthiki Vasthunam.

“The film explores corruption in electoral politics with Suryah playing a corrupt politician.”

The film's performance has been underwhelming for a Sankranthi release, and its future collection remains uncertain as it faces competition from other films released during the festival season.
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Collection: Ram Charan's Film Surpasses Indian 2

title: Ajith Kumar Bags 3rd Spot At 24H Dubai Race Despite Car Accident - Times Now
summary:
Ajith Kumar Bags 3rd Spot At 24H Dubai Race Despite Car Accident

Publication Date: Sunday

Source: TNN

Actor Ajith Kumar secured the 3rd spot at the 24H Dubai Race on Sunday, despite facing a car crash during the practice session. Initially contemplating withdrawal, his spirit led him back to the competition, surprising fans and making his team proud.

Key Points

  • Ajith Kumar finished 3rd in the 991 category and received a special mention in the GT4 category.
  • The accident occurred during practice due to brake failure, but Kumar was unharmed.
  • Despite initial reluctance to participate post-accident, he ultimately decided to race.
  • The team emphasized Kumar's well-being and their assessment of the crash before he returned.

Notable Quotes

“Double whammy for Ajith Kumar 3rd place in the 991 category and Spirit of the race in the gt4 category. What a remarkable comeback after an accident due to a break failure.” - Ajith Kumar's Manager

This incident highlights his dedication to motorsport and the support of his team.
newTitle: Ajith Kumar Achieves 3rd Place at 24H Dubai Race After Car Accident

title: Meet actress who once challenged Aishwarya Rai, Sushmita Sen, quit Bollywood to become a sadhvi, now tough to - India.com
summary:
Barkha Madan: From Bollywood Star to Spiritual Monk

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: India.com

Once a competitor to Aishwarya Rai and Sushmita Sen, actress Barkha Madan has left the glamour of Bollywood behind to live a life dedicated to spirituality as a monk.

  • Barkha Madan participated in Miss India, winning the title of Miss Tourism India while Sushmita Sen was crowned the winner.
  • She made her Bollywood debut in 1996 alongside Akshay Kumar in 'Khiladiyon Ka Khiladi.'
  • Her notable performance was in the supernatural horror film 'Bhoot' (2003).
  • In 2012, she left her acting career to embrace Buddhism, adopting the name Gyalten Samten.
  • Today, she follows the teachings of the 14th Dalai Lama and shares her life experiences on social media.
“There came a turning point in Barkha’s career when her films like Surkhaab and Soch Lo failed to gain much appreciation.”

Barkha Madan's journey from a celebrated actress to a devoted monk highlights her commitment to peace and spirituality over fame.
newTitle: Barkha Madan: From Bollywood Star to Spiritual Monk

summary:
When Jaya Bachchan spoke out on Amitabh Bachchan’s rumoured affair with Rekha

Date: January 12, 2025 Source: The Indian Express

Jaya Bachchan addressed the long-standing rumors of her husband Amitabh Bachchan's relationship with Rekha during a 2008 interview, asserting that her life would have been hell if she took the rumors seriously. She also mentioned that she would not mind them working together again.

  • Jaya Bachchan has been married to Amitabh Bachchan for 51 years.
  • Rumors of Amitabh Bachchan and Rekha's alleged affair have persisted despite their denials.
  • Jaya clarified her stance on the media's speculation and her husband's co-stars.
  • She emphasized the importance of trust and conviction in maintaining their marriage.
  • The couple has not appeared on screen together since the 1981 film Silsila.
“My life would have been hell if I had taken it all seriously. We are made of sterner stuff.”

In conclusion, Jaya Bachchan's perspectives underline the strength of trust in relationships amidst persistent media speculation, and her willingness to embrace her husband's professional collaborations speaks to her confidence.

title: California wildfire: Kim Kardashian demands pay raise for firefighters, $1 per hour since 1984 - Mint
summary:
California wildfire: Kim Kardashian demands pay raise for firefighters, $1 per hour since 1984

Publication Date: Not specifiedSource: Live Mint

Kim Kardashian expressed gratitude to firefighters in California, emphasizing the plight of incarcerated individuals who fight wildfires for just $1 per hour.

Key Points:

  • The death toll from the wildfires has reached 16, with over 12,000 structures destroyed.
  • Kardashian highlighted the dangerous conditions faced by incarcerated firefighters.
  • She revealed that their pay has not changed since 1984, despite inflation and worsening fire conditions.
  • Previously proposed pay increase to $5/hour was denied.
  • Kardashian called on California Governor Gavin Newsom to raise the pay for incarcerated firefighters.
“I am urging to do what no Governor has done in 4 decades, and raise the incarcerated firefighter pay to a rate that honors a human being risking their life to save our lives and homes.”

In conclusion, Kim Kardashian's message calls for reform in the treatment and compensation of incarcerated firefighters who bravely face the dangers of wildfires.
newTitle: Kim Kardashian Advocates for Increased Pay for Incarcerated Firefighters in California Wildfires
